text: Bayar Abubakir , born 31 May 1990, is an Iraqi footballer who plays as a defender for Al-Naft in Iraqi Premier League. ==International career== On 24 July 2016, Bayar Abubakir made his first international cap with Iraq against Uzbekistan in a friendly match. He scored the only goal for Iraq, making it 2-1. ==International goals== :Scores and results list Iraq's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" ! # !! Date !! Venue !! Opponent !! Score !! Result !!
